title: Ep 188 | Fact-Check: Phil Is Not a CBD Oil CEO, Women Who Hunt & How Jase Ended Up in Handcuffs
description:
Jase shares the tale of the closest he ever came to being arrested, and while he insists he did nothing wrong, Al isn't so sure. Phil and Al fact-check the social media posts that claim Phil is running a CBD oil business. But first, Mia whips up a gourmet meal for the family, and Jase is shocked. And the guys discuss women who hunt, why the Bible is a bestselling book, Pilate and the truth in John 18, and politicians and the truth in 2020.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
